General.Name: Zhejiang Heda Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Heda Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the water industry. It offers noise monitors, smart pressure management valves, telemetry terminals, drain level and smart manhole cover monitoring terminals, rotor multi-flow dry and wet remote water meters, rotary wing remote water meters, and IoT gateways. The company also provides software products, such as Unified platform for smart water affairs; metrics cloud platform that offers smart water network solutions to water supply companies; production scheduling management systems; scientific scheduling management systems; online hydraulic modeling systems; intelligent analysis and early warning systems for abnormal events; secondary water supply management systems; agricultural drinking water management system; leakage control systems; leakage early warning systems; pipe network pressure control systems; pipe network geographic information GIS systems; pipe network inspection and maintenance management systems; field work order management systems grid management systems; packing management systems; business charge systems; full service systems; metering center systems; equipment management systems; and water quality management systems. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Jiaxing, China.
